content: tail to secure end curled into antennae row 49-51 - knit all stitches 30 stitches row 52 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches eyes & nose using felt row 54 * kfb k5 * 42 stitches cut out two larger yellow ovals and two smaller ovals and stitch one of each together attach the eyes row 55- 61 knit all stitches 42 stitches above the cast on spot on the head cut out a rounded row 62 * k2tog k5* 36 stitches edge triangle for the nose attach under the eyes row 64- * k2tog k4* 30 stitches row 65-67 - knit all stitches 30 stitches assemble row 68 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches 1 using tails secure head and body together row 70 * kfb k5 * 42 stitches 2 attach antennae on the top forehead location on the head row 71- 77- knit all stitches 42 stitches row 78 * k2tog k5* 36 stitches enjoy row 80- * k2tog k4* 30 stitches
